{{codepointer|Sound}}'''A_Pain''' {{doomwiki|A_Pain}}
(no parameters)
==Usage== Plays the actor's pain sound.
== Examples == A new pain animation for the imp for when he's electrocuted. Screams in pain multiple times.
Pain.Lightning: TROO VW 3 TROO X 3 '''A_Pain''' TROO VW 3 TROO X 3 '''A_Pain''' TROO VW 3 TROO X 3 '''A_Pain''' TROO VW 3 Goto See
